--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "The Assassin <rfa007@c...>"
<rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Kup::
> 
> Kup: Well if we could come up with some old fashioned Null Rays, we 
> could fire at any visable weapon pots and short them out. Of course 
> we would have to get trhough their shields first.
> 
> OOC: The Null Rays are what G1 Starscream had. They short out 
> electrical systems and draw out their energy.
